requirements.description: You can gather or access End User Information only if making the End Users aware that certain End User Information will be available to You

type.summary: Inform End Users about data availability

requirements.description: You must provide a legally adequate privacy notice to End Users about it
You can gather and use End User Information only if obtaining the End User's permission

type.summary: Obtain End User permission for data collection and use

requirements.description: You must ensure the protection of such End User Information

type.summary: Ensure protection of End User Information
